properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the Flavor Params

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the Flavor Params

properties.name: systemName
properties.description: System name of the Flavor Params

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the Flavor Params

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

properties.name: isSystemDefault
properties.description: True if those Flavor Params are part of system defaults

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The Flavor Params tags are used to identify the flavor for different usage (e.g. web, hd, mobile)

properties.name: requiredPermissions
properties.description: Array of partner permisison names that required for using this asset params

arrayType.description: A string representation to return an array of strings

properties.name: sourceRemoteStorageProfileId
properties.description: Id of remote storage profile that used to get the source, zero indicates Kaltura data center

properties.name: remoteStorageProfileIds
properties.description: Comma seperated ids of remote storage profiles that the flavor distributed to, the distribution done by the conversion engine

properties.name: mediaParserType
properties.description: Media parser type to be used for post-conversion validation

properties.name: sourceAssetParamsIds
properties.description: Comma seperated ids of source flavor params this flavor is created from

properties.name: videoCodec
properties.description: The video codec of the Flavor Params

properties.name: videoBitrate
properties.description: The video bitrate (in KBits) of the Flavor Params

properties.name: audioCodec
properties.description: The audio codec of the Flavor Params

properties.name: audioBitrate
properties.description: The audio bitrate (in KBits) of the Flavor Params

properties.name: audioChannels
properties.description: The number of audio channels for "downmixing"

properties.name: audioSampleRate
properties.description: The audio sample rate of the Flavor Params

properties.name: width
properties.description: The desired width of the Flavor Params

properties.name: height
properties.description: The desired height of the Flavor Params

properties.name: frameRate
properties.description: The frame rate of the Flavor Params

properties.name: gopSize
properties.description: The gop size of the Flavor Params

properties.name: conversionEngines
properties.description: The list of conversion engines (comma separated)

properties.name: conversionEnginesExtraParams
properties.description: The list of conversion engines extra params (separated with "|")

properties.description: The container format of the Flavor Params

properties.description: The id of the Flavor Params

properties.name: systemName
properties.description: System name of the Flavor Params

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the Flavor Params

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

properties.name: isSystemDefault
properties.description: True if those Flavor Params are part of system defaults

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The Flavor Params tags are used to identify the flavor for different usage (e.g. web, hd, mobile)

properties.name: requiredPermissions
properties.description: Array of partner permisison names that required for using this asset params

arrayType.description: A string representation to return an array of strings

properties.name: sourceRemoteStorageProfileId
properties.description: Id of remote storage profile that used to get the source, zero indicates Kaltura data center

properties.name: remoteStorageProfileIds
properties.description: Comma seperated ids of remote storage profiles that the flavor distributed to, the distribution done by the conversion engine

properties.name: mediaParserType
properties.description: Media parser type to be used for post-conversion validation

properties.name: sourceAssetParamsIds
properties.description: Comma seperated ids of source flavor params this flavor is created from
